meanings.definition: Happening at the right time; punctual
meanings.sent1: The timely arrival of the bus helped me get to work on time.
meanings.sent2: She always hands in her assignments timely, never missing a deadline.
meanings.sent3: The timely reminder to bring an umbrella saved me from getting soaked in the rain.
meanings.sent4: His timely intervention prevented a small issue from turning into a big problem.
meanings.sent5: The timely chirping of the birds signaled the start of a new day.

meanings.definition: Occurring at a suitable or opportune time
meanings.sent1: The timely rain shower helped the crops grow beautifully.
meanings.sent2: Her timely decision to invest in the stock market paid off handsomely.
meanings.sent3: The timely arrival of the pizza made the party even more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: His timely joke lightened the mood in the room.
meanings.sent5: The timely break in the clouds allowed the sun to shine through.

meanings.definition: Done or occurring at a favorable or appropriate time
meanings.sent1: The timely completion of the project impressed the entire team.
meanings.sent2: Her timely apology helped mend the strained relationship.
meanings.sent3: The timely decision to leave early saved him from the heavy traffic.
meanings.sent4: His timely response to the email showed professionalism.
meanings.sent5: The timely arrival of the weekend brought much-needed relaxation.
